A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Great movie; fast paced; engaging with core fans and everyday movie-goers.
Indeed\, there may be one or two moments which might pull you out of it but at no point to they affect the plot. 
It's fluid in terms of continuity. rich in visuals and texture/feel. 
This was a high degree of difficulty job and Rian Johnson lived up to the expectations. 
Maybe all these elements are not as discernible for everybody\, but they are present in the movie and enrich the viewing experience.
